Di Depan Kepala Daerah, Jokowi: Dunia dalam Ancaman Resesi
06 Nov 2019, 03:31 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Jokowi umumkan wakil menteri (Andhika Prasetia/detikcom)

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) mengingatkan kembali mengenai ancaman resesi ekonomi yang terjadi di beberapa negara. Hal itu diungkapkan saat membuka acara Rakornas Pengadaan Barang dan Jasa Pemerintah di JCC, Senayan, Jakarta Selatan.Jokowi membicarakan mengenai ancaman resesi di depan para kepala daerah seperti gubernur, wali kota, bupati, dan kementerian/lembaga yang merupakan mitra Lembaga Kebijakan Pengadaan Barang/Jasa Pemerintah (LKPP)."Kita harus sadar ekonomi global sedang bergejolak. Pertumbuhan ekonomi dunia juga turun, dunia juga sedang dalam ancaman resesi," kata Jokowi, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Jokowi mengatakan, beberapa negara sudah ada yang mengalami resesi dan ada yang sedang menuju resesi. Penurunan ekonomi suatu negara ini dikarenakan beberapa faktor, seperti perang dagang, guncangan geopolitik, geo ekonomi."Untuk itu kita harus mampu bertahan dan oleh sebab itu harus mampu menurunkan defisit neraca perdagangan, defisit neraca transaksi berjalan, dengan meningkatkan ekspor, substitusi impor dan meningkatkan lapangan kerja," tegas Jokowi.Menurut Jokowi, APBN memiliki peran penting dalam menjaga stabilitas ekonomi nasional meskipun peran swasta di bidang tersebut masih sangat dominan. Dia meminta kepada LKPP agar tetap menerapkan sistem pengadaan barang dan jasa yang merupakan kelanjutan dari APBN dengan baik."Pengadaan barang dan jasa penggerak penting yang memacu pertumbuhan ekonomi baik nasional maupun daerah. Apalagi daerah yang swastanya belum kuat," ungkap dia.Simak Video "Saat Jokowi Duet Bareng GodBless Nyanyikan Lagu Rumah Kita"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/fdl)

In Front of the Regional Head, Jokowi: The World in the Threat of Recession
Nov 6 2019, 03:31 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Jokowi announces deputy minister (Andhika Prasetia / detikcom)

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) reminded again about the threat of economic recession that occurred in several countries. This was revealed when opening the National Coordination Meeting on Procurement of Goods and Services at the JCC, Senayan, South Jakarta. Jokowi talked about the threat of recession in front of regional heads such as governors, mayors, regents, and ministries / institutions who are partners of the Goods Procurement Policy Agency / Government Services (LKPP) "We must realize that the global economy is volatile. World economic growth is also declining, the world is also in the threat of recession," Jokowi said, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11/2019). who are experiencing a recession and some are heading for a recession. The economic downturn of a country is due to several factors, such as trade wars, geopolitical shocks, geo-economics. "For that we must be able to survive and therefore must be able to reduce the trade balance deficit, the current account deficit, by increasing exports, import substitution and increasing employment, "Jokowi stressed. According to Jokowi, the State Budget has an important role in maintaining national economic stability even though the role of the private sector in that sector is still very dominant. He asked LKPP to continue implementing the procurement of goods and services system which is a continuation of the State Budget well. "Procurement of goods and services is an important driver that spurs economic growth both nationally and regionally. Moreover, regions whose privatization is not yet strong," he said.
